issue.title: [CF 685] Sluggish not appearing under Slowed
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 5.1.1.502, Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1

Installed Version

6.0.3

Description

Hello good people. Thanks for an awesome addon, would not know what to do without it. I miss the "Sluggish"-effect from Glyph of Hindring Strikes to be part of the general "Slowed"-effect, that you can monitor. Could you include that in a future update? Thanks :)

Installed Addons

!HealthWatch - 1.20101013 _NPCScan - _NPCScan 5.0.0.5 Auctioneer - Auctioneer Suite 5.14.5335 BattlegroundTargets - 50001-5 Gladius - 5.0.5-04 I Interrupted That - I Interrupted That v3.4.2 LoseControl - LoseControl 5.02 MoveAnything - 13.2.8 Preform AV Enabler - Preform AV Enabler 3.04 Recount - v5.0.5a release TellMeWhen - 6.0.3


> Posted by CurseForge user Parzeval1982 | Imported from CurseForge issue #685 | Raw
